name: Conversations At a Party
description:
Try to talk to people at a party without a natural sense of how conversations are structured. Either they like you or hate you. Either way they will refuse to Talk to you ever again.

The goal for this game was creating a simple, confusing conversation system to replicate feelings of social ineptitude regardless of the player's aptitude.

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS - move
Z,X,C - converse
